short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamer Mode for the browser: a lot of blocked sites and quick search history clearing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamer Mode helps streamers avoid accidentally visiting sites that could get them banned or compromise their privacy.
